title: The Battle that was Lost
description: A bastard gets paid.ï»¿That's the point of being a bastard, after all. Yet in war, payment in blood is more likely than payment in coin. Staegrim knows coins better than he knows people, and he isn't giving his life away for free. Not to the rebels, not for the lords, and not for all of the bloody coins in Rengas.But then... Everyone has a price.
author: Michael S.  Jackson
